briefTitle: Acellular Dermal Matrix in Breast Reconstruction
officialTitle: Allogenic Acellular Dermal Matrix Use in Patients With Breast Reconstruction
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of complications in patients receiving acellular dermal matrix evaluated at 6 months after primary implantation
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* signed informed consent
* total one-side mastectomy due to breast cancer
* age between 18-60 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* failure to obtain signed informed consent
